column3:
Kintai Bridge is a wooden bridge and one of three most famous bridges in Japan. The structure was completed in 1673 by Kikkawa Yoshihiro of the Iwakuni Domain. The bridge was destroyed by a typhoon and flooding in 1950 but was rebuilt in 1953.
